issue.title: [CF 520] Talent tree condition not working
issue.body:
What the title says. All conditions for talent trees are automatically met, whether I'm actually in that tree or not.

(Btw I'm back from a short break. Prepping for MoP I guess.)


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer | Imported from CurseForge issue #520 | Raw

comments.body:
Is this in MoP or on live? And it is with r529, right?

Also, glad to have you back!


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Live. Didn't get into the beta.


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer

@AmeroGer: Go

Go to https://www.curseforge.com/store/items/23-wow-mist-of-pandaria-author-beta/ and see if that works for you (It should have a field on the right side to input your battle.net email address). If it doesn't, PM me your battle.net email and I will hook you up with an invite so you can help test if you want, since I haven't redeemed my invite from Curse yet (I got into beta via Annual Pass).

Edited Aug 8, 2012

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

@Cybeloras: Go

Thanks, I'm really excited about that. I've just placed the order. I guess now I'll have to wait and see.


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer

@Cybeloras: Go

I've played some more on live while waiting for a reaction from Curse. I'm now fairly confident that it's not a specific condition like talent trees that's malfunctioning. Rather it appears that metaicons just aren't checking their conditions. I have a bunch of metaicons only checking for talent trees, which is what made me misidentify the problem.


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer

Yeah, I just noticed this when i switched to my MM spec to do some pvp last night - I have a meta icon with some conditions to warn me if I am focus capped and should cast an aimed shot or an arcane shot. It'll be fixed in the next revision.

Thanks for the report!


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

This is still broken as of 6.1.1 (Blood DK). Primary Spec works but choosing a specific spec fails. Unless it is supposed to check that Primary Spec is Blood, then the tooltip/ui should be cleaned up a little more to clarify that.

Edited Dec 10, 2012

> Posted by CurseForge user scotepi

This ticket was closed almost 4 months ago.

Please open a new ticket if you are still having an issue, and be sure to follow the instructions there (include an export string of an icon or group that the issue is happening with)

Edited Dec 10, 2012

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
